Adapter.Name: AccountStateAdapterSCH
Adapter.Description:
This adapter is responsible for changing states of accounts from closed to pending final bill and Closed to Archived. The rules are:
Closed To Pending Final Bill: This operation gets triggered when there is usage that comes in as either late usage or as part of a straggler to an account that is in closed state. End of period processing detects this changes the account state to Pending Final Bill.
Closed To Archived: This transition happens when an account has aged x number of months (configurable) after being Closed. End of period processing detects that changes the account state to Archived.

item.Description:
Cet adaptateur est chargé de modifier les états de comptes à partir de fermée à l’attente facture finale et fermé à archivés. Les règles sont les suivantes:         
Fermé Pour attente final du projet de loi:          Cette opération se déclenche quand il ya utilisation qui vient en tant que          soit la fin de l’utilisation ou dans le cadre d’un retardataire à un compte qui est          à l’état fermé. Traitement de fin de période détecte cela modifie la          compte de l’état d’attente final du projet de loi.         
Fermé Pour archivée:          Cette transition se passe quand un compte a vieilli x nombre de mois          (configurable) après avoir été fermée. Fin de la période de traitement détecte          qui change l’état de compte pour archivées.

[IT] This adapter is responsible for changing states of accounts from closed to pending final bill and Closed to Archived. The rules are:
Closed To Pending Final Bill: This operation gets triggered when there is usage that comes in as either late usage or as part of a straggler to an account that is in closed state. End of period processing detects this changes the account state to Pending Final Bill.
Closed To Archived: This transition happens when an account has aged x number of months (configurable) after being Closed. End of period processing detects that changes the account state to Archived.

[ES] This adapter is responsible for changing states of accounts from closed to pending final bill and Closed to Archived. The rules are:
Closed To Pending Final Bill: This operation gets triggered when there is usage that comes in as either late usage or as part of a straggler to an account that is in closed state. End of period processing detects this changes the account state to Pending Final Bill.
Closed To Archived: This transition happens when an account has aged x number of months (configurable) after being Closed. End of period processing detects that changes the account state to Archived.

[DE] This adapter is responsible for changing states of accounts from closed to pending final bill and Closed to Archived. The rules are:
Closed To Pending Final Bill: This operation gets triggered when there is usage that comes in as either late usage or as part of a straggler to an account that is in closed state. End of period processing detects this changes the account state to Pending Final Bill.
Closed To Archived: This transition happens when an account has aged x number of months (configurable) after being Closed. End of period processing detects that changes the account state to Archived.

[es-MX] This adapter is responsible for changing states of accounts from closed to pending final bill and Closed to Archived. The rules are:
Closed To Pending Final Bill: This operation gets triggered when there is usage that comes in as either late usage or as part of a straggler to an account that is in closed state. End of period processing detects this changes the account state to Pending Final Bill.
Closed To Archived: This transition happens when an account has aged x number of months (configurable) after being Closed. End of period processing detects that changes the account state to Archived.

item.DisplayName: Adaptador de estado de conta de alteração genérico (agendado)
item.Description:
Este adaptador é responsável por mudar estados de contas de fechado para pendentes conta final e fechou a Arquivado. As regras são:         
Fechado para Pending final Bill:          Esta operação é acionado quando há o uso que vem em como          ou uso final ou como parte de um vagabundo para uma conta que é          em estado fechado. Fim do período de processamento detecta isso muda a          conta do Estado para Pending final Bill.         
Closed Para arquivados:          Esta transição acontece quando uma conta envelheceu x número de meses          (configurável) depois de ser fechado. Fim do período de processamento detecta          que altera o estado conta com Arquivado.

[en-GB] This adapter is responsible for changing states of accounts from closed to pending final bill and Closed to Archived. The rules are:
Closed To Pending Final Bill: This operation gets triggered when there is usage that comes in as either late usage or as part of a straggler to an account that is in closed state. End of period processing detects this changes the account state to Pending Final Bill.
Closed To Archived: This transition happens when an account has aged x number of months (configurable) after being Closed. End of period processing detects that changes the account state to Archived.

[JA] This adapter is responsible for changing states of accounts from closed to pending final bill and Closed to Archived. The rules are:
Closed To Pending Final Bill: This operation gets triggered when there is usage that comes in as either late usage or as part of a straggler to an account that is in closed state. End of period processing detects this changes the account state to Pending Final Bill.
Closed To Archived: This transition happens when an account has aged x number of months (configurable) after being Closed. End of period processing detects that changes the account state to Archived.

Adapter.Name: NonRecurringCharges
Adapter.Description: MetraTech standard adapter to generate non-recurring charges from the product catalog. This adapter will generate the appropriate subscription and unsubscription charges for subscription events that occurred for the period in which the adapter is run.

item.Description: MetraTech adaptateur standard pour générer des charges non récurrentes de le catalogue de produits. Cet adaptateur va générer la souscription appropriée et les frais de désabonnement pour les événements de souscription qui ont eu lieu pour la période dans laquelle l’adaptateur est exécuté.

[IT] MetraTech standard adapter to generate non-recurring charges from the product catalog. This adapter will generate the appropriate subscription and unsubscription charges for subscription events that occurred for the period in which the adapter is run.

[ES] MetraTech standard adapter to generate non-recurring charges from the product catalog. This adapter will generate the appropriate subscription and unsubscription charges for subscription events that occurred for the period in which the adapter is run.

[DE] MetraTech standard adapter to generate non-recurring charges from the product catalog. This adapter will generate the appropriate subscription and unsubscription charges for subscription events that occurred for the period in which the adapter is run.

[es-MX] MetraTech standard adapter to generate non-recurring charges from the product catalog. This adapter will generate the appropriate subscription and unsubscription charges for subscription events that occurred for the period in which the adapter is run.

Adaptador padrão MetraTech para gerar encargos não recorrentes de o catálogo de produtos. Este adaptador irá gerar a assinatura apropriada e encargos unsubscription para eventos de assinatura que ocorreram durante o período em que o adaptador é executado.

[en-GB] MetraTech standard adapter to generate non-recurring charges from the product catalog. This adapter will generate the appropriate subscription and unsubscription charges for subscription events that occurred for the period in which the adapter is run.

[JA] MetraTech standard adapter to generate non-recurring charges from the product catalog. This adapter will generate the appropriate subscription and unsubscription charges for subscription events that occurred for the period in which the adapter is run.

Adapter.Name: FailedTransaction
Adapter.Description: MetraTech standard adapter to delete failed transactions a certain number of days after they have been marked as dismissed. This adapter will also delete successfully resubmitted transactions a certain number of days after they have been resubmitted.

item.DisplayName: Supprimer les transactions en échec ignorées
item.Description: MetraTech adaptateur standard pour supprimer des transactions ayant échoué un certain nombre de jours après qu’ils ont été marqué comme rejeté. Cet adaptateur sera également soumis à nouveau avec succès supprimer transactions par certain nombre de jours après qu’ils ont été soumis à nouveau.

[IT] MetraTech standard adapter to delete failed transactions a certain number of days after they have been marked as dismissed. This adapter will also delete successfully resubmitted transactions a certain number of days after they have been resubmitted.

[ES] MetraTech standard adapter to delete failed transactions a certain number of days after they have been marked as dismissed. This adapter will also delete successfully resubmitted transactions a certain number of days after they have been resubmitted.

[DE] MetraTech standard adapter to delete failed transactions a certain number of days after they have been marked as dismissed. This adapter will also delete successfully resubmitted transactions a certain number of days after they have been resubmitted.

[es-MX] MetraTech standard adapter to delete failed transactions a certain number of days after they have been marked as dismissed. This adapter will also delete successfully resubmitted transactions a certain number of days after they have been resubmitted.

Adaptador padrão MetraTech para excluir transações falhas de um certo número de dias depois de terem foi marcado como demitido. Este adaptador também excluirá reapresentado com sucesso transações por certo número de dias depois de terem sido reenviados.

[en-GB] MetraTech standard adapter to delete failed transactions a certain number of days after they have been marked as dismissed. This adapter will also delete successfully resubmitted transactions a certain number of days after they have been resubmitted.

[JA] MetraTech standard adapter to delete failed transactions a certain number of days after they have been marked as dismissed. This adapter will also delete successfully resubmitted transactions a certain number of days after they have been resubmitted.

Adapter.Name: PipelineFailoverAdapter
Adapter.Description: Resubmits failed transactions that failed due to db cluster failover, network error or other rerunable database error.

item.Description: Resoumet transactions ayant échoué qui ont échoué en raison de db basculement de cluster, erreur réseau ou autre erreur de base de données réexécutable.
[IT] Resubmits failed transactions that failed due to db cluster failover, network error or other rerunable database error.
[ES] Resubmits failed transactions that failed due to db cluster failover, network error or other rerunable database error.
[DE] Resubmits failed transactions that failed due to db cluster failover, network error or other rerunable database error.
[es-MX] Resubmits failed transactions that failed due to db cluster failover, network error or other rerunable database error.
Reenvia transações falhas que falharam devido a falha de cluster db, erro de rede ou outro erro de banco de dados rerunable.
[en-GB] Resubmits failed transactions that failed due to db cluster failover, network error or other rerunable database error.
[JA] Resubmits failed transactions that failed due to db cluster failover, network error or other rerunable database error.

Checkpoint.Name: Phase1Checkpoint
Checkpoint.Description: This is a example checkpoint in the End Of Period processing. Processing will stop at this point until the checkpoint is manually completed. Currently this allows verfication of the processing of usage that has happened before invoices are generated.

item.Description: Ce est un exemple poste de contrôle à la fin du traitement période. Le traitement se arrêter à ce point jusqu’à ce que le point de contrôle est effectuée manuellement. Actuellement cela permet verfication du traitement de l’usage qui se est passé avant que les factures sont générées.

[IT] This is a example checkpoint in the End Of Period processing. Processing will stop at this point until the checkpoint is manually completed. Currently this allows verfication of the processing of usage that has happened before invoices are generated.

[ES] This is a example checkpoint in the End Of Period processing. Processing will stop at this point until the checkpoint is manually completed. Currently this allows verfication of the processing of usage that has happened before invoices are generated.

[DE] This is a example checkpoint in the End Of Period processing. Processing will stop at this point until the checkpoint is manually completed. Currently this allows verfication of the processing of usage that has happened before invoices are generated.

[es-MX] This is a example checkpoint in the End Of Period processing. Processing will stop at this point until the checkpoint is manually completed. Currently this allows verfication of the processing of usage that has happened before invoices are generated.

Este é um exemplo do ponto de verificação no final do processamento Período. Processing vai parar neste ponto até o ponto de verificação for concluída manualmente. Atualmente esta permite Verificação das da transformação de uso que já aconteceu antes faturas são gerados.

[en-GB] This is a example checkpoint in the End Of Period processing. Processing will stop at this point until the checkpoint is manually completed. Currently this allows verfication of the processing of usage that has happened before invoices are generated.

[JA] This is a example checkpoint in the End Of Period processing. Processing will stop at this point until the checkpoint is manually completed. Currently this allows verfication of the processing of usage that has happened before invoices are generated.

Adapter.Name: AccountStateAdapterEOP
Adapter.Description:
This adapter is also responsible for changing states of accounts from pending final bill to closed. The rules are:
Pending Final Bill To Closed: This operation is interval based, i.e. it behaves like an EOP adapter. The transition happens when the hard closed has reached on that specific interval.

item.DisplayName: Générique Change compte Adaptateur État (fin de période)
item.Description:
Cet adaptateur est également responsable de la modification des états de comptes à partir de         attendant facture finale à fermé. Les règles sont les suivantes:         
Attente final du projet de loi Pour Fermé:          Cette opération est basée intervalle, ce est à dire qu’il se comporte comme un EOP          adaptateur. La transition se produit lorsque le disque a atteint fermé sur          cet intervalle spécifique.

[IT] This adapter is also responsible for changing states of accounts from pending final bill to closed. The rules are:
Pending Final Bill To Closed: This operation is interval based, i.e. it behaves like an EOP adapter. The transition happens when the hard closed has reached on that specific interval.

[ES] This adapter is also responsible for changing states of accounts from pending final bill to closed. The rules are:
Pending Final Bill To Closed: This operation is interval based, i.e. it behaves like an EOP adapter. The transition happens when the hard closed has reached on that specific interval.

[DE] This adapter is also responsible for changing states of accounts from pending final bill to closed. The rules are:
Pending Final Bill To Closed: This operation is interval based, i.e. it behaves like an EOP adapter. The transition happens when the hard closed has reached on that specific interval.

[es-MX] This adapter is also responsible for changing states of accounts from pending final bill to closed. The rules are:
Pending Final Bill To Closed: This operation is interval based, i.e. it behaves like an EOP adapter. The transition happens when the hard closed has reached on that specific interval.

Este adaptador também é responsável por mudar estados de contas de         pendente conta final para fechado. As regras são:         
Pending Bill final para Fechado:          Esta operação é baseada intervalo, ou seja, ele se comporta como um EOP          adaptador. A transição acontece quando o disco fechado atingiu em          esse intervalo específico.

[en-GB] This adapter is also responsible for changing states of accounts from pending final bill to closed. The rules are:
Pending Final Bill To Closed: This operation is interval based, i.e. it behaves like an EOP adapter. The transition happens when the hard closed has reached on that specific interval.

[JA] This adapter is also responsible for changing states of accounts from pending final bill to closed. The rules are:
Pending Final Bill To Closed: This operation is interval based, i.e. it behaves like an EOP adapter. The transition happens when the hard closed has reached on that specific interval.

Checkpoint.Name: HardCloseCheckpoint
Checkpoint.Description: This is a final manual checkpoint before the interval is hard closed. Processing of the interval can be verified before it is closed. If this checkpoint is removed, the interval will automatically be «hard closed» after successful processing of the interval.

item.Description: Ce est un point de contrôle manuel final avant la pause est difficile fermé. Traitement de l’intervalle peut être vérifiée avant la fermeture. Si ce point de contrôle est retiré, l’intervalle sera automatiquement «dur fermé» après le traitement réussi de l’intervalle.

[IT] This is a final manual checkpoint before the interval is hard closed. Processing of the interval can be verified before it is closed. If this checkpoint is removed, the interval will automatically be «hard closed» after successful processing of the interval.

[ES] This is a final manual checkpoint before the interval is hard closed. Processing of the interval can be verified before it is closed. If this checkpoint is removed, the interval will automatically be «hard closed» after successful processing of the interval.

[DE] This is a final manual checkpoint before the interval is hard closed. Processing of the interval can be verified before it is closed. If this checkpoint is removed, the interval will automatically be «hard closed» after successful processing of the interval.

[es-MX] This is a final manual checkpoint before the interval is hard closed. Processing of the interval can be verified before it is closed. If this checkpoint is removed, the interval will automatically be «hard closed» after successful processing of the interval.

Este é um ponto de verificação manual do final antes do intervalo é difícil fechado. Processamento do intervalo pode ser verificada antes de ser fechado. Se o ponto de verificação é removida, o intervalo será automaticamente «duro fechado» após o processamento bem sucedido do intervalo.

[en-GB] This is a final manual checkpoint before the interval is hard closed. Processing of the interval can be verified before it is closed. If this checkpoint is removed, the interval will automatically be «hard closed» after successful processing of the interval.

[JA] This is a final manual checkpoint before the interval is hard closed. Processing of the interval can be verified before it is closed. If this checkpoint is removed, the interval will automatically be «hard closed» after successful processing of the interval.
